project_descr: Demonstration for Fuel-cell Bus Commercialization in China (Phase II)

outputs.output_descr: The two-phase project will demonstrate the operational and commercial viability of hydrogen FCBs in China through the pilot FCBs and construction of two hydrogen refueling systems in Beijing and Shanghai. The project will also support the development of hydrogen and fuel cell vehicles(FCV) related value chain while enhance scientific, technical, and industrial capacity for commercializing FCBs; and increase the understanding of FCVs and clean vehicles among government, academics, investers, media, and other key actors. Finally, a series of activities will focus on defining a detailed strategy

project_title: pims 2933:demo -fuel cell bus commercialization phase ii
